item.title: Pinkest Gin
item.description: 2 oz London dry gin¾ oz grapefruit juice½ oz simple syrup2 dashes Peychaud’s bitters Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a coupe glass.

item.title: Little Bit Bittah
item.description: 2 oz vodka½ oz Campari1½ oz grapefruit juice½ oz grenadinegrapefruit wedge Shake vodka, Campari, grapefruit juice, and grenadine. Strain into rocks glass over ice. Garnish with grapefruit wedge.

item.title: Blushing Betty
item.description: 1½ oz bourbon1 oz grapefruit juice½ oz simple syrupgrapefruit twist Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with grapefruit twist.
